events.comment: Fin 1 : deviant jumps with Emma / Connor failed to reach deviant in time
Fin 3 : Connor leapt for Emma and fell
Fin 5 : Deviant shot Connor and jumps with Emma

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allen: What the fuck are you doing? You gonna talk to it or what?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Captain Allen? My name is Connor. I'm the android sent by CyberLife."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allen: It's firing at everything that moves, it already shot down two of my men... We could easily get it, but they're on the edge of the balcony. If it falls, she falls."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Do you know if it's been behaving strangely before this?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Has it experienced an emotional shock recently?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Have you tried its deactivation code?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allen: I haven't got a clue. Does it matter?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I need information to determine the best approach."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allen: It's the first thing we tried."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Do you know if it's been behaving strangely before this?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Has it experienced an emotional shock recently?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Have you tried its deactivation code?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Allen: Listen, saving that kid is all that matters. So either you deal with this fucking android now, or I'll take care of it."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The aquarium must have been hit during the incident and part of the glass is broken. Water leaking from it"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "There's a fish on the ground, it must have fallen from the fishtank when it got dammaged. It's a clown fish ; Clownfish or anemonefish are fishes from the subfamily Amphiprioninae in the family Pomacentridae. Thirty species are recognized: one in the genus Premnas, while the remaining are in the genus Amphiprion. In the wild, they all form symbiotic mutualisms with sea anemones. Depending on species, anemonefish are overall yellow, orange, or a reddish or blackish color, and many show white bars or patches. The largest can reach a length of 17 cm (6.7 in), while the smallest barely achieve 7–8 cm (2.8–3.1 in)."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "1 - Put the fish back inside the water in the aquarium"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "It's a family portrait of the victim's family"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PHILLIPS, JOHN Born : 10/11/1999 Lives : 1554 Park av. Detroit"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PHILLIPS, CAROLINE Born : 05/23/2001 Lives : 1554 Park av. Detroit"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PHILLIPS, EMMA Born : 09/02/2028 Lives : 1554 Park av. Detroit"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The music is still playing. The victim probably didn't hear what was happening."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "It's a tablet. There's a video playing."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Emma: This is Daniel, the coolest android in the world! Say hi, Daniel!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Emma: You're my bestie! We'll always be together!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: So the deviant was nammed ''Daniel''. Seems like the the hostage was very close to him."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "PHILLIPS, JOHN Height : 6’0’’ - Weight : 187.2 Estimated time of death : 07:29pm"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ".355 BULLET WOUND Upper lung hemorrhage Pneumothorax"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ".355 BULLET WOUND Lower lung hemorrhage Internal bleeding"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ".355 BULLET WOUND left kidney perforated fatal abdominal trauma"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I can see the father's tablet under the sofa."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Tablet: Your order for an AP700 android has been registered. CyberLife thanks you for your purchase."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: The deviant must have discovered that the family was planning on replacing him."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "P.O DECKART, ANTONY Height : 5’8’’ - Weight : 170.5 Estimated time of death : 08:03 pm"

action.name: Set text
action.param: ".355 BULLET WOUND Right heart ventricle perforated Internal bleeding"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "GUNSHOT RESIDUE Lead styphnate, antimony sulfide Only one shot"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I can see the police officer's gun between the kitchen counters"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "!!WARNIG!! ANDROIDS ACT – 2029 Androids are strictly forbidden to carry or use any type of weapon"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "There is a news live broadcast on the fridge's display."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Reporter - ITM TV : It's been just over an hour since a little girl was taken hostage on the top floor of a building here in downtown Detroit. Details are still emerging on what exactly happened, but the hostage taker could be the family's android. He may have taken the lives of at least one family member and a police officer... If confirmed, this would be the first case of an android deliberately taking human lives. By all signs, the SWAT team are preparing for an assault and-"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "CHILD SIZE SHOE Colorful model Human blood traces"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "It's a child's shoe. There's blood on it. The victim could be injuried."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "It's a gun case, but the gun is missing : MS853 BLACK HAWK Capacity : 17 rounds (.355) Overall : 8.5in / Barrel : 5in."

action.name: Set text
action.param: ".355 AMMUNITION Velocity : 365m/s / Energy : 659j Bullet Weight : 115gr / Power factor : 414k"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "This door leads to the bathroom. It seems nothing happened inside."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "The table is set, looks like the family was about to have dinner."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: Stay back! Don't come any closer or I'll jump!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Emma: No! No, please! I'm begging you!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: My name is Connor. What about you? What is your name?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: How do you know my name?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I know a lot of things about you. I've come to get you out of this."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: Daniel. That's the name they gave me. Stay back!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I know you're angry, Daniel. But you need to trust me and let me help you."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I don't want your help! Nobody can help me! All I want is for all this to stop... I... I just want all this to stop..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I want you to let Emma go. She's just a little girl, she has nothing to do with this."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: No way! You'll shoot me the second she's free. But I'm not that stupid! No, I am not that stupid..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I'm not going to hurt you. I just want to talk and find a solution."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: Talk? I don't wanna talk. It's too late for that now. It's too late..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I'm an android, just like you. I know how you're feeling."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: What difference does it make if you're an android? You're on their side! You can't understand how I'm feeling. "

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: No, I don't have a gun."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: You're lying! I know you have a gun!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I'm telling you the truth, Daniel. I came here unarmed."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: Drop it! No sudden moves, or I'll shoot!"

sub-events.comment: ajouter bruit *jeter un pistolet par terre*
Connait: raison possible, relation Emma et Daniel, pas de pistolet

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: There's no way out, Daniel. What you've done is too serious. The only question is whether or not you take another innocent life."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: It's not up to you - I'm holding all the cards! If I die, she dies. You hear me?!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Look what you did! You're designed to serve humans, not kill them!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: What was I designed to be? Their slave? Their toy? I just wanted them to care about me... I just wanted to matter... I just wanted to be someone..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Listen, I know it's not your fault. These emotions you're feeling are just errors in your software."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: No, it's not my fault... I never wanted this... I loved them, you know...but I was nothing to them...just a slave to be ordered around..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: You're defective, Daniel. There's a problem with your software. We're going to fix you and everything will be okay."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I don't need to be fixed! I'm working perfectly! But my eyes are open now... I will never let anyone humiliate me again... Ever!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: They were going to replace you and you became upset. That's what happened, right?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I thought I was part of the family. I thought I mattered... But I was just their toy, something to throw away when you're done with it..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I know you and Emma were very close. You think she betrayed you - but she's done nothing wrong."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: She lied to me... I thought she loved me... but I was wrong... She's just like all the other humans..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Emma: Please help me... I don't wanna die! I don't wanna die..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Nobody's going to die. Stay calm. Everything's going to be fine."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: There's no way out, Daniel. What you've done is too serious. The only question is whether or not you take another innocent life."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: It's not up to you - I'm holding all the cards! If I die, she dies. You hear me?!"

action.param: "Connor: They were going to replace you and you became upset. That's what happened, right?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I thought I was part of the family. I thought I mattered... But I was just their toy, something to throw away when you're done with it..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: There's no way out, Daniel. What you've done is too serious. The only question is whether or not you take another innocent life."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: It's not up to you - I'm holding all the cards! If I die, she dies. You hear me?!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Look what you did! You're designed to serve humans, not kill them!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: What was I designed to be? Their slave? Their toy? I just wanted them to care about me... I just wanted to matter... I just wanted to be someone..."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Listen, I know it's not your fault. These emotions you're feeling are just errors in your software."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: No, it's not my fault... I never wanted this... I loved them, you know...but I was nothing to them...just a slave to be ordered around..."

action.param: "Daniel: Urgggh... I can't stand that noise anymore! Tell that helicopter to get out of here!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: There, I did what you wanted."

sub-events.comment: enlever son hélicoptère

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I don't think they'd listen to me."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I'm your last chance, Daniel. If you let it slip, they'll kill you. Let the hostage go, you have no other choice."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: I'm your last chance, Daniel. If you let it slip, they'll kill you. Let the hostage go, you have no other choice."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: You have to trust me, Daniel. Let the hostage go and I promise you everything will be fine."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: You have to trust me, Daniel. Let the hostage go and I promise you everything will be fine."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Listen, there are snipers on every roof. Let the hostage go. You have no other choice."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Listen, there are snipers on every roof. Let the hostage go. You have no other choice."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: You don't really wanna jump, Daniel. Or you would've done it already. Now, hand me the gun and this will all be over."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: Don't come any closer! Come any closer and I swear I'll jump!"

sub-events.comment: Déclanche fin "probability of success too low" --> fail to build trust --> deviant jumps with emma
Fin 1 : deviant jumps with Emma / Trust too low

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: Okay... Look, I'll stay right here."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I want everyone to leave... And I wanna car! When I'm outside the city, I'll let her go!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: What now, Daniel? Is this really what you want?"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: You lied to me! You lied to me!!!"

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: It's up to you how the story ends. Make the right choice, Daniel."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I didn't want this... No, you left me no choice... No choice..."

sub-events.comment: Fin 5 : Deviant shot Connor and jumps with Emma
Fin 6 : Connor shot deviant
Fin 6 : Connor shot deviant

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Connor: You're not going to die. We're just going to talk. Nothing will happen to you. You have my word."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel: I've spent my life taking orders. Now it's my turn to decide."

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Daniel jumped down the building with the hostage. Connor couldn't reach the devant in time."

sub-events.comment: Fin 2 : Snipper shot deviant / Trust 100%

action.name: Set text
action.param:
"I the end, Daniel surrenderd. However, he then got shot by a snipper.
Daniel: You lied to me, Connor. You lied to me..."

sub-events.comment: Fin 3 : Connor leapt for Emma and fell

action.name: Set text
action.param: "As Daniel was about to jump down, Connor leapt for the hostage and manages to switch places with her. He the fell down with Daniel"

sub-events.comment: Fin 4 : Connor died protecting Emma

action.name: Set text
action.param: "As Daniel was about to shoot, Connor leapt towards the hostage and takes the bullet, saving her"

sub-events.comment: Fin 5 : Deviant shot Connor and jumps with Emma

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Before Connor could react, Daniel shot him in the head. Then, he jumped down with the hostage."

sub-events.comment: Fin 6 : Connor shot deviant

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Before Daniel could react, Connor shot him in the head, saving the hostage."
